text: The Eurovision Song Contest 1972 was the 17th edition of the Eurovision Song Contest and took place in the Netherlands' second-largest city, Rotterdam. == Results == Draw Country Artist Song Language Place Points 01 "" German 3 107 02 "" French 11 81 03 "" Irish 15 72 04 "" Spanish 10 83 05 "Beg, Steal or Borrow" English 2 114 06 and Benny Borg "" Norwegian 14 73 07 "" Portuguese 7 90 08 "" French 8 88 09 Helen and Joseph "" Maltese 18 48 10 and Kim Floor "" Finnish 12 78 11 Milestones "" German 5 100 12 "" Italian 6 92 13 "" () Serbo- Croatian 9 87 14 Family Four "" Swedish 13 75 15 and Peter MacLane "" French 16 65 16 "" French 17 55 17 "" French 1 128 18 Sandra and Andres "" Dutch 4 106 == References == 1972 Category:1972 in Europe Category:1972 in music
title: Eurovision Song Contest 1972
